name: Sukanya Sripada
bio: Sukanya Sripada is a talented chef who specializes in creating traditional Thai dishes with a modern twist. With 10 years of experience under her belt, she has become a master of her craft and has gained a loyal following of food lovers from around the world.

recipes.name: Tom Yum Soup
recipes.method:
1. In a pot, bring water to boil. Add lemongrass, kaffir lime leaves, and galangal.
2. Add chili paste and shrimp, stir well.
3. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 5 minutes.
4. Serve hot.

recipes.name: Green Curry Chicken
recipes.method:
1. In a wok, heat the green curry paste over medium-high heat for 1 minute.
2. Add chicken and cook until browned.
3. Add coconut milk, eggplant, and bamboo shoots. Simmer for 10-15 minutes.
4. Serve hot with steamed rice.

recipes.name: Papaya Salad
recipes.method:
1. Shred green papaya and slice tomatoes.
2. In a bowl, mix together lime juice and fish sauce.
3. Add papaya and tomatoes, and mix well.
4. Top with peanuts and serve.

name: Naree Boonyakiat
bio: Naree Boonyakiat is one of the most respected chefs in the Thai food scene. With 15 years of experience, she has honed her skills to create unique and flavorful dishes that are beloved by foodies everywhere. Her passion for food is infectious, and her creativity knows no bounds.

name: Arunee Suthipong
bio: Arunee Suthipong is a rising star in the Thai food world. With 8 years of experience, she has already made a name for herself with her innovative and delicious dishes. Her passion for cooking shines through in everything she creates, and her dedication to using only the freshest ingredients is what sets her apart from the rest.

name: Pichaya Sripiboon
bio: Pichaya Sripiboon is a master of Thai cuisine. With 12 years of experience, she has perfected her craft to create dishes that are both traditional and innovative. Her attention to detail is what sets her apart, and her commitment to using only the best ingredients is what makes her dishes truly exceptional.

name: Kanya Wattanawiroj
bio: Kanya Wattanawiroj is a chef who is passionate about using local and seasonal ingredients in her dishes. With 9 years of experience, she has developed a unique culinary style that is inspired by the flavors of Thailand. Her dishes are known for their freshness and their ability to showcase the natural flavors of the ingredients.
